comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: William Robinson Pattangall (1865-1942), Maine politician, chief justice of the Maine State Supreme Court.  His wife Gertrude McKenzie Pattangall (1874-1950) was also active in Maine politics.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: He stood as Democratic candidate in a special election on September 8, 1913. See NYT article of Sept 10, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9907E0DB123FE633A... This suggests that the photo captioned "Edw. M. Lawrence" { www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4194443825/ } IS of the Maine politician Edward M Lawrence, who stood as the Progressive candidate in the same election.

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the confirmation on Pattangall and Lawrence. We'll add their full names to the source data.
